examples: The interviewer asked me a series of questions during the job interview.
Better ask teacher about.
Can I ask a favour of you?
Can I ask a question?
Did you ask the price?
words.defineEn: to use words in a question form or tone to get answers from someone
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ trong một hình thức câu hỏi hoặc giai điệu để có được câu trả lời từ một ai đó

examples: The color green has a restful effect.
The ocean's blue color amazed us.
That color has gone out of fashion.
What is your favorite color?
The artist mixed different colors to create a masterpiece.
words.defineEn: a quality such as red, green, blue, yellow, etc. that we see when we look at something
words.defineVi: một phẩm chất chẳng hạn như đỏ, xanh lá cây, xanh dương, vàng, v.v. mà chúng ta thấy khi nhìn vào một thứ gì đó

examples: He takes size 5 boots.
The family has grown in size recently.
What size shoes do you take?
Tortelloni's substantial size makes them a better choice compared to the bite-sized tortellini.
Of course we'll change it for a larger size, Madam.
words.defineEn: how small or big something is; the amount of something
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó nhỏ hay lớn như thế nào; số lượng của một cái gì đó

examples: The bride's wedding dress is white.
A white blouse will show the blood.
They served white rice with the chicken curry.
After the surgery, his face was as white as a sheet.
After the car accident, her face was as white as a ghost.
words.defineEn: having the color that is the lightest, like snow
words.defineVi: có màu nhạt nhất, như tuyết

examples: The night sky is black, except for the stars and the moon.
The company is finally in the black.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
She prefers her coffee black, without any sugar or cream.
words.defineEn: having the color that is the darkest, like most crows
words.defineVi: có màu tối nhất, giống như hầu hết các loài quạ

examples: Red wine leaves a stain.
The roses in the garden were red with velvety petals.
These shrubs produce bright red berries.
REd algae adds a burst of color to the underwater landscape.
The company has plunged $37 million into the red.
words.defineEn: having the color of tomatoes or blood
words.defineVi: có màu của cà chua hoặc máu

examples: My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
The market had ripe oranges with bright orange peels.
Bitter orange peel is a great addition to my herbal remedies.
She poured orange juice into a clear glass.
She has an orange cat.
words.defineEn: having the color of carrots or pumpkins
words.defineVi: có màu của cà rốt hoặc bí ngô

examples: The market had vibrant yellow lemons on display.
Many lanes are desecrated with yellow lines.
She drew a yellow sun on the corner of the paper.
They planted yellow flowers in the garden to attract bees.
We finally settled on a soft yellow for the kitchen walls.
words.defineEn: having the color of lemons or the sun
words.defineVi: có màu chanh hoặc mặt trời

examples: The leaves on the trees are green.
The lights changed to green.
The color green has a restful effect.
The green frog hopped from one lily pad to another.
The vibrant green color of perilla leaves adds an attractive touch to any dish.
words.defineEn: having the color of fresh grass or most plant leaves
words.defineVi: có màu của cỏ tươi hoặc hầu hết các lá cây

examples: Blue blood is no guarantee of any particular merit, competence, or expertise.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The ocean's blue color amazed us.
They wore blue jeans to the party.
The little boy's favorite toy was a blue car.
words.defineEn: having the color of the ocean or clear sky at daytime
words.defineVi: có màu sắc của đại dương hoặc bầu trời quang đãng vào ban ngày

examples: The book on the shelf had a purple cover.
The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.
The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
She was born in the purple.
She used a purple pen to write in her journal.
words.defineEn: having the color of most ripe eggplants
words.defineVi: có màu của hầu hết cà tím chín

examples: My grandmother's hair is gray.
She used a gray pencil to sketch out her drawing.
The wrinkles and gray hair show that he's getting on, but he's still full of wisdom and experience.
The energy company's board of directors was composed entirely of men in gray suits who were resistant to investing in renewable energy sources.
The cat is long in the tooth, with its gray whiskers and slow movements, but it still purrs and enjoys a warm spot in the sun.
words.defineEn: having a color between white and black, like most koalas or dolphins
words.defineVi: có màu giữa trắng và đen, giống như hầu hết gấu túi hoặc cá heo

examples: My cat's fur is brown.
My father has brown eyes.
Brown algae have complex life cycles with genetic diversity.
We used brown sugar as a key ingredient in our homemade barbecue sauce.
On the day of the wedding, Brown experienced cold feet.
words.defineEn: having the color of chocolate ice cream
words.defineVi: có màu của kem sô cô la

examples: Small cracks appeared in the wall.
That holiday cost me a small fortune.
This small restaurant is the best pound for pound in the city.
The whole may be smaller than the sum of its parts!
I gave a small donation.
words.defineEn: little or below average in size, amount, degree, etc.
words.defineVi: ít hoặc dưới mức trung bình về kích thước, số lượng, mức độ, v.v.

examples: The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
The media barely lays a glove on him.
The media portrayed the politician in a bad light, focusing only on their past mistakes.
The government has loosened its hold on the media considerably.
The media speculated about the celebrity couple's relationship status, wondering if they were an item or just good friends.
words.defineEn: describing a size that is neither too big nor too small, but rather in the middle
words.defineVi: mô tả một kích thước không quá lớn cũng không quá nhỏ, mà ở giữa

examples: Most characters in his movies are somewhat larger than life.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
He left a large estate.
A large bus was sitting outside.
The truck delivered a large shipment of goods to the warehouse.
words.defineEn: big or above average in amount or size
words.defineVi: lớn hoặc trên trung bình về số lượng hoặc kích thước

words.defineEn: (of a size) bigger or larger than what is considered standard or normal
words.defineVi: (của một kích thước) lớn hơn hoặc lớn hơn những gì được coi là tiêu chuẩn hoặc bình thường
